short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll your Reddit feed using keyboard arrows!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension, you can navigate through Reddit easily by;
- Scrolling the next post with down arrow
- Scrolling the previous post with up arrow
- Going to comments with right arrow
- Going back with left arrow.

Also it skips the ads and live streams as you browse.

That's all this extension does.
